original_title: 夫には興味ありません。SNSでチ〇ポを食い散らかし、淫乱セックスに溺れてしまったビッチ人妻。
overview: My husband is not interested in me, and it's just empty to do it alone. SNS that I started because I wanted to be wanted by someone. At first, I was just going to listen to my complaints, but... I was approached by a man, and I met him just on the spur of the moment. As soon as I got to the hotel, he started looking for me... this is what I wanted... this was it. Sex that just wants each other without spoiling. It's dangerous... I think I'm going to be addicted to it.
title: I’m not interested in my husband… Bitchy married woman who ate up dick on SNS and got addicted to dirty sex. Ayaharu Natsume
